sn22.35:4.2: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.35:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn22.35:4.5: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetu;
sn22.35:4.6: yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho, appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn22.35:4.7: “Yaṃ kho, bhikkhu, anuseti, tena saṅkhaṃ gacchati;
sn22.35:4.8: yaṃ nānuseti, na tena saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”ti.
sn22.35:5.1: “Yathā kathaṃ pana tvaṃ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāsī”ti?
sn22.35:5.5: Saṅkhāre ce anuseti tena saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
sn22.35:5.7: Rūpañce, bhante, nānuseti na tena saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
sn22.35:5.11: viññāṇañce nānuseti na tena saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
sn22.35:5.12: Imassa khvāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāmī”ti.
sn22.35:6.2: Sādhu kho tvaṃ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāsi.
sn22.35:6.3: Rūpañce, bhikkhu, anuseti tena saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
sn22.35:6.8: Rūpañce, bhikkhu, nānuseti na tena saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
sn22.35:6.12: viññāṇañce nānuseti na tena saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
sn22.35:6.13: Imassa kho, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena, bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti.
sn22.35:7.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
sn22.35:8.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—
sn22.35:8.2: yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṃ—
sn22.35:8.3: brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
sn22.35:8.4: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
sn22.35:8.5: Aññataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahataṃ ahosīti.
